data.convo: Is there someone I can talk to about a payment question ? Yes , we can handle that here . How can I help you ? My paycheck that just arrived is less than last week ’ s check . Did you work at all during the last pay period ? Yes , actually , I did make a little bit of money . Did you report it on your Continued Claim Form ? Yes , I showed that income on the Continued Claim Form . Well , we deducted a portion of the income that you made from this week ’ s check . Maybe I just shouldn ’ t show the income then . That is cheating and , if you get caught , you will be fined and disqualified from collecting unemployment .
